```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
options(knitr.kable.format = 'markdown',
				digits = 1, scientific = TRUE)
```


# `r params$countids$study_id`


```{r counttabs}
countIds <- params$countids
countTime <- params$counttime

knitr::kable(countIds[, .(species = matched_name, family, class)],
						 booktabs = TRUE)

knitr::kable(cbind(countIds[, .(sensor_type_id, nID = nIndividual, 
												 nDeploy = nDeployment, nTag, nRows)],
									 countTime[, .(lenStudy, nYear = nYears)]),
						 booktabs = TRUE)
```


```{r countnas}
nas <- params$countnas
knitr::kable(data.table::data.table(col = names(nas), `% NA` = 100 * as.numeric(nas))[
	col %in% c('individual_id', 'location_lat', 'location_long')
], booktabs = TRUE)
```

```{r details}
cols1 <- c('name',
					 'principal_investigator_name',
					 'principal_investigator_email')
cols2 <- c('license_terms',
					 'license_type',
					 'grants_used')
details <- params$details
pander::pander(details[, .SD, .SDcols = cols1])
pander::pander(details[, .(license_terms, license_type, textclean::replace_non_ascii(grants_used))])
details$citation
```
